Articles.Content:
DON'T USE THIS UNTIL JUNE 22ND

This is the candidate thread of KANS. All naming candidates will be listed here. Here is an example of a proper candidate.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Candidate EXAMPLE1 UNDER VOTING

Submitter's Name: Bobtherocketmaster008

Suggested Feature: Bonga Island

Home Planet or Moon: Kerbin

Coordinates on the World: Use degree, minute or use a screenshot that can be traced on ISA MapSat.

General Description of the Feature: Its a nice island offshore of the launch site.

Why your name should be considered: I found it and it is close to the launch site so it should be documented.

Have you been to this area : I have flown over it.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

REAL CANDIDATES POSTED HERE

Coming on June 22nd, 2013

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/34279-Kerbal-Astronomic-Naming-Society

Do not post your submission here. Instead send it to the email that you were given when you join.

Do not post your vote here. Instead send your vote to the email that you were given when you join, in the format you were given.

Edited June 6, 2013 by whiterafter

I like it, yay.

so do we vote by saying yay or nay?
I'm currently making some proposals fore Minmus and Dres, I have some fun names for some locations. I'll send them when I have clear ISA mapsat images
